<!-- 2. Go to Tools: Import in the blog's admin panels (or Manage: Import in older versions of WordPress). -->
<!-- 3. Choose "WordPress" from the list. -->

		<title>Septic System Design - Title V</title>
		<link>http://yerkaengineering.com/?p=15</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Yerka Engineering LLC has extensive experience in the design of new or upgraded septic systems to meet the requirements of the MA Title V regulations. The firm also inspects new and upgraded septic systems during construction to insure that they are installed as designed.]]></content:encoded>

The firm also inspects new and upgraded septic systems during construction to insure that they are installed as designed.]]></content:encoded>

		<item>
		<title>Home</title>
		<link>http://yerkaengineering.com/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 21 May 2010 11:46:58 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://yerkaengineering.com/?page_id=4</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>YERKA  ENGINEERING, LLC.</strong></span>

Yerka Engineering, LLC is a multi-faceted civil engineering firm located in Uxbridge Massachusetts.    Michael Yerka has gained an outstanding reputation doing business with municipalities and private developers in the South Central Worcester County area.  for over 25 years.  The firm is distinguished for its <em>“common sense solutions”</em> to engineering problems brought about by the ever-increasing demands put on projects due to the more stringent regulatory requirements.  Yerka Engineering LLC  provides the following services for   Public and Private Development:   
<ul>
	<li>Survey – Topographic Mapping and Property Line Surveys</li>
	<li>Site Development – Planning and Design</li>
	<li>Septic System Design – Soil Evaluations and System Design</li>
	<li>Roadway and  Subsurface Utility  Design </li>
	<li>Construction Oversight</li>
	<li>Environmental Permitting-Permitting experience under the Wetlands Protection Act</li>
	<li>Wetland Delineation – Professional Wetland Scientist on staff</li>
	<li>Stormwater Management</li>
	<li>Commercial, industrial, residential and municipal site development projects.</li>
	<li>Hydrological / Hydraulic analysis and the design of  stormwater  mitigation and drainage systems.</li>
	<li>Private and municipal waste water systems.</li>
	<li>Extensive experience with MA Title V regulations and local permitting requirements.</li>
	<li>Oversees land development projects that range from initial  site assessments through final design and construction oversight.</li>
</ul>
 Yerka Engineering’s team of engineers,  wetland scientist  and surveyors have the expertise to meet many project requirements.

<a href="http://yerkaengineering.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/05/page0001-Large.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-56" title="Subdivision" src="http://yerkaengineering.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/05/page0001-Large-1024x667.jpg" alt="" width="640" height="416" /></a>

<a href="http://yerkaengineering.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/05/TitleSheetSept08.pdf">Subdivision</a>]]></content:encoded>

		<title>septicsystm</title>
		<link>http://yerkaengineering.com/?attachment_id=19</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 21 May 2010 12:38:03 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>

		<wp:post_id>19</wp:post_id>

		<item>
		<title>Subdivision (pdf)</title>
		<link>http://yerkaengineering.com/home/titlesheetsept08/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 26 May 2010 11:47:23 +0000</pubDate>

		<title>Services</title>
		<link>http://yerkaengineering.com/services/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 14 Jun 2010 01:59:06 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[dtSlider query=post_type=service id=service_slider args='dynamicTabs: false, dynamicArrowRightText: "»", dynamicArrowLeftText: "«"'] ]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>90</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2010-06-14 01:59:06</wp:post_date>
